headline: Convey Expands Strategic Relationship with CenterPoint Energy to Transform Customer Communications Especially During Times of Extreme Weather
summary: DENVER - Convey is proud to announce a major expansion of its relationship withCenterPoint Energy . Convey, formerly known as Message Broadcast, is a longtime leader in providing customer engagement...
